name: Secret Assignment
description:
You get assigned one of the following roles:

- Agent : Get a secret word and try to find and vote out the spy.

- Spy : Try to blend in with the others and win by finding the secret word.

- Intern : You only get the first letter of the word, so be careful not to be mistaken as a Spy!

Please make sure to NOT share your role with other players.

  • Joining a game:

Create a room and invite your friends with the provided Room Code. 

It is important to use a voice chat app like Discord to communicate with your friends as the whole game is built on communication.

  • How rounds work:

You can all talk at the same time or decide on a specific order, up to you and your friend group.

At the end of the round, vote out the Sussiest player.

The game supports about 800 words for each of the following languages: English, French and Spanish.

Comment below if you want us to add another language.
